name: Shop Master 3D - Grocery Game
description:
Welcome to Shop Master 3D!
You are the owner of a supermarket!
You're the owner of a supermarket! Do your job, build more shelves, and make lots of money!

The game has a number of different modes.
Checkout Mode
Use the barcode reader to scan products as they come in!
Use the barcode reader to scan the products as they come in. Don't keep the customers waiting!

Product Delivery
Place the products on the shelves in the store.
It is important to read the atmosphere and place the products appropriately.

Catch the shoplifters.
Catch shoplifters. Start by finding the ones who have merchandise in their bags!
Chase after the culprit so you don't miss him!


Recommended for people who think it's funny to play these apps!
Hyper market 3D,Deep Clean Inc.,Cashier 3D

The game is free and easy to play to pass the time!

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)




EU / California users can opt-out under GRPR / CCPA.
Please respond from the pop-up displayed when starting in the app or within the settings in the app.
